title: Mount Rushmore National Memorial: Photo Gallery
body: Photo Gallery                    Mount Rushmore Now   14 Photos  Rushmore Now          Hall of Records   15 Photos  Artist Gutzon Borglum envisioned a Hall of Records behind the sculpture that was never completed. The Hall of Records and the mountain are inaccessible to the public.          Lincoln Borglum Museum   9 Photos  Tour of Museum            Digital Scanning Project Photos   18 Photos            Photographs by Charles D'Emery   22 Photos  Charles Dâ€™Emery photos, courtesy of NPS, Mount Rushmore National Memorial          Mount Rushmore Historic Photos   23 Photos  Historic Photos            Wildflowers at Mount Rushmore.   5 Photos  Commonly seen wildflowers.          Birds at Mount Rushmore   3 Photos  This gallery contains images of some of the birds you are likely to see at Mount Rushmore National Memorial.
